Introduction

Eurick James Ramos

My hobbies when I am finish with assignment is play online games and explore about computers. I am an Ambivert person so sometimes I like talking to other people sometimes not but I am friendly person also kind.

Why did you enroll as an ICT student? Why not other track or strands?

I chose ICT because I thought there’s no math in this strand. but I also love exploring about computer because I spend my childhood playing computer games so I am familiar to using computer.

What is your dream job? How do you think will this course will help you in pursuing your career?

As of the moments I don’t have plans for my future job I only want to finish this strand so I can find a job with high salary

to whom are you dedicating your success in finishing in this course

I dedicate it for my self because i did a lot of efforts and works on it.
